ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF((Name = VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.Name , $ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.Name , Name ) && loan__Branch__c = VLOOKUP($ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.loan__Branch__c , $ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.Name,loan__Branch__c ) && loan__Fiscal_Year__c = VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.loan__Fiscal_Year__c , $ObjectType.loan__MF_Account__c.Fields.Name, loan__Fiscal_Year__c ) ),TRUE,FALSE)
